original_text: Nobody must make a perfume that has a sweet smell like this oil. Nobody must put this oil on any person who is not a priest. Anyone who does not obey this rule will no longer belong to my people.” ’
korean_text: 이와 같은 것을 만드는 모든 자와 이것을 타인에게 붓는 모든 자는 그 백성 중에서 끊어지리라 하라

sentences.original_text: that has a sweet smell like this oil

sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 이 기름을 바르면 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: on any person who is not a priest
Anyone who does not obey this rule
will no longer belong to my people
sentences.korean_translation: 더 이상 내 백성에 속하지 않을 것입니다
